dmca.title: NetEnforcers complains of  images in Froogle
dmca.body:
Thu, 7 Dec 2006 16:26:20 -0500

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [Sony Television] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [Sony Television]/:
 
EZHotDeal.com
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.ezhotdeal.com/store/images/prod/prod_8360.jpg&size=2&dhm=d94387f2&hl=en
KDL46XBR2

KLV-32U100M

KLV-S23A10

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [ Aureo L. Bellido de Luna Jr. ]
